    • Method Detail

      • compile

        public abstract java.io.File compile(java.lang.String code)
        Compiles the given code, and if there is no error. Creates a code text file (under folder 'code') and a compiled (runnable) file (under folder 'runnable').
        Parameters:
        code - programming code
        Returns:
        the path of the file created; if null, error occurred

      • run

        public abstract java.lang.String run(java.io.File compiledFile,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> inputs)
        Run the given compiled (byte) file and provide the given inputs.
        Parameters:
        compiledFile - file containing the (byte) runnable code
        inputs - the desired inputs in order, to provide during running
        Returns:
        output string, if null error occurred

      • checkEnvironment

        public abstract boolean checkEnvironment()
        Checks if the environment is proper for compiling and running in certain programming language.
        Returns:
        true if the environment meets the requirements, false otherwise

        public final java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
